Hashire! Osomatsu-san: TV collaboration commercials between JRA (Japanese Racing Association) and Osomatsu-san. The first episode promotes the G1 Series. The second episode promotes the Japan Cup. And the third episode promotes the Grand Prix.
['Osomatsu-san', 'Osomatsu-san: Ouma de Kobanashi', 'Mutsugo to Ouma no Monogatari']
